document_data.name: Mulberry
document_data.mainbody: '''Mulberries''', known as '''kiwa''' in [[Wa-an]], were a type of deciduous [[:Category:Trees|tree]] found in the Realms.
document_data.Habitats:
* In [[Faer√ªn]], these trees could be found in the nation of [[Unther]]'s [[Methwood]].
* In the [[Hordelands]], mulberry trees could be found in the [[Plain of Horses]], particularly being cultivated by the community of [[Peqqir]] following the nomad [[Torgoja P'a]]'s helping its people to create an irrigation system.
* In [[Kara-Tur]],
* In [[Zakhara]], the [[House of Al-Kamari]] tended to mulberry orchards that stood south of the city of [[Huzuz]].
document_data.Trivia: *''[[Mulberry Leaf]]'' and ''[[Silkworm (weapon)|Silkworm]]'' were [[butterfly sword]]s - [[Shou]] weapons, that once belonged to [[Yu Mao]], a crime lord from [[Thesk]].
